content: free no-sew marshmallow bunny pattern pattern created by @naomi _ crochet free no-sew marshmallow bunny pattern about thank you for downlaoding my pattern andi hope you will enjoy this pattern please do not claim this pattern as your own copy it or sell it you may happily sell finished products if you use this pattern please tag me @naomi _ crochet on instagram so i can see your creations materials abbreviations chenille yarn i used magic_ring magic_ring himalya dolphin baby single_crochet single_crochet 100g/120mt increase increase 4mm crochet hook decrease decrease 8mm saftey eyes double_crochet double crorchet scissors bbl st 5dc bobble stitch sewing needle half_double_crochet half_double_crochet stuffing treble_crochet treble_crochet stitch marker r round f o fasten_off pattern created by @naomi _ crochet free no-sew marshmallow bunny pattern the pattern r1 6sc in a magic_ring 6 r2 6inc 12 r3 1sc * chain 9 and starting from the 4th stitch from the hook 3tr 2dc 1hdc * increase 1sc increase x4 1sc repeat ** increase 18 r4 2sc increase x6 24 r5 - 7 24sc 24 r8 8sc bbl st 5sc bbl st 9sc 24 *add saftey eyes between row 5-6 5 stitches apart* r9 - 10 24sc 24 r11 8sc bbl st 7sc bbl st 7sc 24 r12 bbl st 1sc decrease 2sc decrease x5 18 *stuff body* r13 9dec 9 f o finish stuffing body and sew hole closed embroider a nose between eyes congrats you just finished your marshmallow bunny pattern created by @naomi _ crochet
